title: Large-Scale Atmos Circ
description: Structure and dynamics of phenomena including weather regimes, storm tracks, El Nino-Southern Oscillations, teleconnections, monsoons, Arctic Oscillation, stratospheric polar vortex, and stratosphere-troposphere coupling.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: EAS 4655 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or EAS 6502 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
